name: BEACHSIDE RUNNERS
description:
Inspired by SEGA arcade games such as tropical setting of OutRun 2 SP and the over-the-top handling model of the Crazy Taxi games, BEACHSIDE RUNNERS is a twitchy high-speed race against the clock.

FEATURES:

  • Arcade mode.
  • Gold Rush mode.
  • Two playable vehicles with differing handling characteristics. (All rounder/Drifter)
  • Hi-Score Saving.
  • Smooth 60FPS frame rate.
  • Support for Xbox One (or other XInput compatible) controllers.

Created in Unity 2017.1 for an advanced scripting University module. Please check the in-game credits for the relevant information regarding art/audio.
